message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your position, but I can't go lower than $11,000. This product is truly worth it, and I believe you'll see the value in the long run.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable paying. I'm going to stick with my offer of $8,500. It's a fair price for both of us.
